author: deepal
msg: - We decided in the mailing list that FileSystemConfigurator will work in a way that , it will take both repo and axis2.xml as absolute path.
- So when creating file system based configuration you have to pass two absolute path. And you can not give one relative to other.

author: angela
msg: DomUtil: add variant of getText that returns a given default value if the specified element contains no text.

author: angela
msg: DomUtil.getText returns null if element contains no text.

author: angela
msg: use prefix/uri of EMPTY_NAMESPACE constant instead of ""
